name: Card Killer
description: This Game is Multiplayer, Come and play with Up to 4 People. Use your skills in this First Person Game to Destroy your Enemies that are trying to attack you, Zombies will try and eat your brains. Survive as long as possible using what your can find in the Map, And buy with your points your only weapon, Cards. Yes playing cards are the only Weapon you have in this game. But not every Card is Created Equally. Good Luck!!!
